name: Default Firewall rule should not have any rules (except http and https)
description: Checks to ensure that the default Firewall rule should not have any (non http, https) rules. The default Firewall rules will apply all instances by default in the absence of specific custom rules with higher priority. It is a safe practice to not have these rules in the default Firewall.
searchModel.query: config from cloud.resource where api.name= 'gcloud-compute-firewall-rules-list' AND json.rule = ' ($.name equals default-allow-ssh or $.name equals default-allow-icmp or $.name equals default-allow-internal or $.name equals default-allow-rdp) and ($.deleted is false) and ($.sourceRanges[*] contains 0.0.0.0/0)'
recommendation:
1. Login to GCP Console and from Networking, select VPC network.
        2. Go to Firewall rules and click on Ingress.
        3. For 'default' network, select all the rules which start with 'default-' (except http, https) and delete the selected rules.
